DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the path guidance information.

Info.description: The text of the guidance displayed to the user in the user interface.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the record has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language of the path. Valid values are: Chinese (Simplified): zh_CN Chinese (Traditional): zh_TW Danish: da Dutch: nl_NL English: en_US Finnish: fi French: fr German: de Italian: it Japanese: ja Korean: ko Norwegian: no Portuguese (Brazil): pt_BR Russian: ru Spanish: es Spanish (Mexico): es_MX Spanish (Mexico) defaults to Spanish for customer-defined translations. Swedish: sv Thai: th The Salesforce user interface is fully translated to Thai, but Help is in English.

MasterLabel.description: Label for this path guidance information record.
